query: I need assistance in designing a travel itinerary for 2 individuals, departing from San Juan and exploring 3 cities in Texas. The trip will happen over 7 days, from March 2nd to March 8th, 2022. We have a budget of $8,500 and would prefer private rooms for our accommodations.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Dallas,Lubbock,Houston]
